Class NewEmployeeController

    public class NewEmployeeController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class is the controller for the new employee scene.

      • onSaveButtonPushed

        void onSaveButtonPushed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This Button saves the values for the new employee. Has a condition that confirms the password fields, to see if they match. When the employee is created with success the scene changes back to the admin page.`
        Parameters:
        event - the event
